## Plots
There are in total 13 videos. 


```{r echo=FALSE}
vidstats <- read.csv("~/Downloads/mooc-dataset-201920/cyber-security-7_video-stats.csv")
Steps <- vidstats$step_position
b <- vidstats$total_downloads
c <- vidstats$total_views
par(mfrow=c(1,2))
plot(Steps, b,
main="Downloads of videos",
ylab="",
type="l",
col="blue")

plot(Steps, c,
main="Total views of videos",
ylab="",
type="l",
col="red")

slices <- c(59.59,	4.12,	20.21,	6.69,	2.96,	5.79) 
lbls <- c("Europe", "Ocenia", "Asia", "North America", "South America", "Africa")
pct <- round(slices/sum(slices)*100)
lbls <- paste(lbls, pct) # add percents to labels 
lbls <- paste(lbls,"%",sep="") # ad % to labels 
pie(slices,labels = lbls, col=rainbow(length(lbls)),
   main="Pie Chart of Countries")


```
